categories.title: Bug Fixes
list: Fixed the bug that would cause Cosmic Reach models be loaded as Java Block Models

categories.title: Features
list: Added control over whether the output JSON file is minimized or not
Added option to export model as a child of another model (saves only textures and the name of the parent model specified
Made it possible to load a child model (parent model will be loaded too)

categories.title: Features
list: Added Cosmic Reach Entity Model format, export and import
Added Cosmic Reach Entity Animation export and import tools
Changed JSON output format to suit the original Cosmic Reach JSON files more

categories.title: Removed
list: Possibility to import either a maximized or a minimized JSON file. All of JSON files exported are now maximized
